description: This table maps survey not useful reason IDs to their respective reason description (based on https://github.com/samsara-dev/backend/blob/master/go/src/samsaradev.io/safety/safetyproto/harsheventsurvey.proto)

schema.name: survey_not_useful_reason_id
schema.description: The id of the survey not useful reason.

schema.name: survey_not_useful_reason
schema.description: The name of the survey not useful reason.
